ssot__LoyaltyBenefit__dlm.name: Loyalty Benefit
ssot__LoyaltyBenefit__dlm.description: The Loyalty Benefit DMO represents a perk or enhacement that's available to members of a loyalty program, such as waived airline baggage fees, complimentary hotel stays, or a rental car upgrade.

ssot__BenefitActionId__c.description: A reference ID for actions such as creating a service entitlement that can be triggered automatically when a loyalty program benefit is assigned to a program member.

ssot__BenefitStatusId__c.description: A reference ID for benefit status values such as Active or Inactive.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by an external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__Description__c.description: The description of the loyalty program.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__LoyaltyBenefitPriorityNumber__c.description: Priority rating of the loyalty benefit, for example, 1 for highest or 2 for second highest priority.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the Loyalty Benefit DMO.

ssot__LoyaltyBenefitTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the Loyalty Benefit Types that are used to group the various benefits available within a Loyalty Program. For example, baggage benefits could be used to group reduced fees, extra baggage allowances, and weight limit benefits.

ssot__LoyaltyBenefitUOM__c.description: The type of benefit unit within a Loyalty Benefit Type. For example, if the Loyalty Benefit Type is luggage, then UOM is the number of additional free bags.

ssot__LoyaltyBenefitValueText__c.description: Loyalty Benefit values are used to determine how many units of the benefit type. For instance if Loyalty Benefit UOM is the number of free bags, then Benefit Value could be 1, 2 or 3.
